thread.title: BRIEF-Zijin Mining Comments On Impact Of Earthquake On Porgera Gold Mine

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zijin Mining Comments On Impact Of Earthquake On Porgera Gold Mine

organizations.name: reuters) - zijin mining group co ltd

text: 08 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Zijin Mining Comments On Impact Of Earthquake On Porgera Gold Mine Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 27 (Reuters) - Zijin Mining Group Co Ltd: * PORGERA GOLD MINE APPEARS UNAFFECTED BY EARTHQUAKE, BUT MINEâ€˜S PRIMARY POWER GENERATING FACILITY IN HIDES HAS SUSTAINED DAMAGE * PORGERA GOLD MINE IS OPERATING ON BACK-UP POWER AND SOME PRODUCTION ACTIVITIES HAVE BEEN SUSPENDED TO CONSERVE POWER. * NO EMPLOYEES OF PORGERA GOLD MINE WERE INJURED DURING EARTHQUAKE OR DURING SUBSEQUENT AFTERSHOCKS.
